thread.title: Carlo Ancelotti's 10 finest moments in management | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Carlo Ancelotti's 10 finest moments in management | Daily Mail Online

author: Adam Shergold For Mailonline
title: Carlo Ancelotti's 10 finest moments in management | Daily Mail Online
text: Carlo Ancelotti celebrated his 1,000th game in management on Saturday... we look back at 10 of his finest moments with Milan, Chelsea, PSG, Real Madrid and Bayern Munich Ancelotti marked his 1,000th match as a manager with 8-0 win over Hamburg The Italian has enjoyed success wherever he has managed across Europe He led Milan to Champions League glory in 2003 and again in 2007 At Chelsea, Ancelotti achieved the Premier League and FA Cup double in 2010 He ended Paris Saint-Germain's wait for a title, starting an era of dominance Ancelotti was also the man to end Real Madrid's agonising wait for La Decima
